text:
@piersmorgan @SpanishDan1 @FT Yep. If your policy is not to test many people then when you count those who died with ‘confirmed’ COVID19 your numbers are a lot smaller and less likely to get you in trouble come the Public Enquiry. 

We are literally burying the evidence that will be needed. Take samples now!
